website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive and versatile club that works well from anywhere close to the green.
pros: This hybrid putter is 34" long and features a 37" loft
Smooth radius sole can be used in any lie condition
cons: Does not come with a headcover
Some buyers didn't like the base weight, while others felt that it took a little getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money to save strokes.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but for the price I thought why not give it a shot. I can say I am very surprised. Chipping has always been a weak part of my game by this club is a game changer. Using my natural putting stroke, the ball jumps off the face and starts rolling in the line. I’ve used for one round and will be using it for a tournament Saturday. Keeping track I got up and down on three holes I probably would not have with chipping so it saved 3 strokes today. Put the ego aside and don’t care what anyone thinks, if this can save 3-4 strokes a round, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing after reading all the great reviews, and I must say I'm pleased with it after 25 rounds or so. It truly is a user friendly multi purpose weapon to have in my bag. I find myself pulling this club out of the bag more than any other in any given round for most any lie from 100 yards out, to the fringe of the green. Just super easy to use and very forgiving. Don't know what else I can say, except it has a permanent home in my bag now.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman W.

customer_reviews.title: ... all my golf buddies told me that it was garbage. I tried it for 1 round and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this because all my golf buddies told me that it was garbage. I tried it for 1 round and it is INSANE! If you are a beginner like myself that often misses the green, do yourself a favor and pick one of these up. I dropped 9 strokes with it my 1st round, and chipped in twice. By the time we got to the back 9, I was using this club from 50 yards out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: My short game gave me so much trouble I would ...
customer_reviews.text: My short game gave me so much trouble I would put from the rough and 30 feet off the green, not any more. Dropped 10 strokes off my game.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A plus for game improvement
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and balance Easy to line up Once you learn to use it, a definite game improver
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD M. MADISON

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this hybrid putter. Works great from 10 yards in, around the greens, especially with tight lies. Saved at least three strokes the last time I played. I have tried several and this one works the best, just using a normal putting stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Blixecel

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Game Improver
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!!! Thus is the best club I ever bought to improve my game. It’s a chipper, and it’s versatility is amazing. I highly recommend it for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: TAZBUG

customer_reviews.title: Easy as pie.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered yesterday.. today I went to a driving range to get used to it, that took about three hits. I was able to hit targeted areas I was trying to hit between 30 feet and 100 yards. Will it be a bit different on the course? Yes. Will it lower my overall score? I believe so. Inexpensive game changer, this will be my 'go to' club to help my short game. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Jury is out
customer_reviews.text: Nice club and I am adapting to its use At some courses I use it often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is very good. Will keep it
customer_reviews.text: Not used to the putter angel, but the quality is very good. Will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No more duffs?
customer_reviews.text: A great aid but it takes a lot of practice. Still learning
customer_reviews.author: Scott Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chipper!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people might look down on Pinemeadow, but I personally have purchased and used their clubs for years now without a single hesitation to purchase more from them. This chipper is of high quality, heavy duty and well worth the money. I would have paid double for it!
customer_reviews.author: gopack31

customer_reviews.title: Wow your friends!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to golfing but this thing makes me look legit. Perfect tool for the fringe around putting greens. Swing it like a putter and you get the results of a chipper. Great accessory club everyone should have for their bag. After having it, I would have paid much more for the results it gives. Handsome looking club and is stronger made than it appears.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my SO and he loved it. His gokf buddy went and got one too.
customer_reviews.author: Quintella

customer_reviews.title: Hybrid pitching putter!
customer_reviews.text: Nice club. Takes getting used to but it does help me control the ball inside fringe area. I need more practice but am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great price product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. It took some getting used to but now he had mastered it and wouldnt play without it. Good quality great price product.
customer_reviews.author: YncomH

customer_reviews.title: BEST KEPT SECRET IN GOLF
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use..daughter loves it and her score shows!
customer_reviews.author: Les Everett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it comes in handy around the greens. Takes some practice to get use to the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Get that ball up in the air and on the green even from distance.
customer_reviews.text: This club works great, just received it today and went right out to the course. It is a great chipper with good loft. I am going to enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Barb H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hybrid putter works great for short chips. It has the same loft as my 7 iron, but it's easier to be consistent with and I don't have any mis-hits with this club.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Cheating club!  a must have in your bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome club, designed to be swug like a putter just in the fringe of the green. Everyone who has seen me use it called it a cheating club! Adds greatly to my pine meadow hybrid irons set!
customer_reviews.author: Derrek S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Already re-gripped it with an oversize putter grip. Can't wait to get it on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The chipper/ putter. is wonderful. Has greatly improved. Cna't bet it for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Chipping is very easy. I just take this club and chip close to the cup and use the putter then. Very good product and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: R. Quinto

customer_reviews.title: Every golfer needs one
customer_reviews.text: Good for those in between chip shots. A must have for around the green.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: For the last few years my chipping has been horrible. I was tailoring my game to prevent chipping it was so bad. Lessons didn't fix it. Recently, a guy in our foursome had one of these and he was deadly. I gave it a try and was much impressed and had to get one. I'm certainly not "deadly" but it is a huge improvement and brought fun back into the game.
customer_reviews.author: William Foley

customer_reviews.title: but is a nice club to chip with
customer_reviews.text: Takes time to get use to, but is a nice club to chip with.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald and Karen

customer_reviews.title: Like the feel and weight of the club
customer_reviews.text: Helps with those short chips around the green. Results in fewer mishits.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Love this 'chipper' type club
customer_reviews.text: Love this 'chipper' type club, perfect when you are just off the green when a pitching wedge could be too much.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Hatem

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my tool kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun club for a duffer like me. My short game has always been tough and I usually blade a shot that needs a quick pop and roll. With this club I can almost always get a nice straight pop with a good run. I chipped in on this hole (pix) from about 40 feet out.
customer_reviews.author: Judy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son - in law and he loves It. He uses it every time he's on the green.
customer_reviews.author: Mom316

customer_reviews.title: Not a putter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn't want to use my old Slotline Pistol blade putter. I found it for a steal at $15. it works great as a chipper and that's what it is. You can putt with it, the same as you can with a wedge. You do have to alter your grip toward the target if usig it as a putter. ! putt every time after you alter your grip. Again...it is a chipper not a putter. Excellent quality though.
customer_reviews.author: 1ncogn3gro

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: This club has been a big help. Very good for chipping to the green from 50 yds out and in.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cook

product_meta.title: Pinemeadow Golf Hybrid Putter (Right-Handed, Regular, 34-Inch)
product_meta.description: In chipping, the hands need to be ahead of the clubhead during the swing for solid impact. The Pinemeadow Hybrid Putter features an offset hosel, which presets the hands at address, providing solid shot after solid shot. The heavy mallet chipper head also promotes a true pendulum motion and won't get stuck in the turf. The 37° loft on the club gets the ball up and running easily. The smooth radius of the sole allows for use in any lie condition.
feature_bullets: GOLF CHIPPER: 37 degree chipper helps improve. your short game around the green
PLAYS LIKE A PUTTER: You can use your regular putting stroke for maximum accuracy
DESIGN: Wide sole and heavy promotes better impact and control. Target line helps alignment on where you want your chips to go.
IMPROVE SHORT GAME: Eliminated thin and fat chips shots from the fringe and around the green
